faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the colorization technology work?
faq.a1: We use the RetroColor AI engine, developed by us and trained on millions of historical and modern photos. Our technology analyzes shapes, textures, and context to predict the most likely colors for each element, such as skin, clothing, and landscapes.
faq.a2: Yes, absolutely. We use certified payment processors with banking-level SSL encryption. We do not store your credit card data on our servers.
faq.a3: Your privacy is our priority. Photos are processed locally by the RetroColor AI engine and automatically deleted from our servers after 24 hours. We never use your photos to train our models without your consent.
faq.q4: Can I restore very damaged photos?
faq.a4: RetroColor AI is excellent at removing scratches, noise, and stains. However, if critical facial parts are completely missing, the engine will attempt to reconstruct based on symmetry and known anatomical patterns.
faq.q5: What is the maximum file size?
faq.a5: Currently, RetroColor Engine supports JPG and PNG files up to 5MB. For larger files, the engine may take longer to process.
